1) The detected devices include two meross Light Strips (IDs: 22e11820-64fa-4bed-ad8f-f98ef66de298 and 363f714d-e4fe-4052-a78c-f8c97542e709), a c2c-switch (ID: 2214d9f0-4404-4bf6-a0d0-aaee20458d66), and a TV (ID: 415228e4-456c-44b1-8602-70f98c67fba8). The Light Strips are capable of switching on/off, adjusting brightness, and controlling color settings. The c2c-switch can also be switched on/off and has health check capabilities. The TV can be controlled for power and audio mute functions.

2) The current state of the c2c-switch is off, indicating it is already in the desired state. The first Light Strip (22e11820-64fa-4bed-ad8f-f98ef66de298) is currently set to a brightness level of 70, while the second Light Strip (363f714d-e4fe-4052-a78c-f8c97542e709) is at a brightness level of 48. The TV is available for power control and can be muted. Actionable controls include turning off the Light Strips using their switch capabilities, while the TV can be turned off or muted as needed.
